title: Climate change: How a green new deal really could go global
description: Chief Environment correspondent Justin Rowlatt considers the prospects for a big economic makeover.

title: My Money: 'Our alternative quarantine holiday'
description: Alyssa Hulme from Utah in the US takes us through her weekly spending during the coronavirus pandemic.

title: In mid-Pacific with nowhere to land
description: A group of performers were halfway across the ocean in a 75ft boat when the pandemic erupted - leaving them with nowhere to go.

title: George Floyd: ‘As a black American I am terrified’
description: After the death of George Floyd, young African-Americans in Minneapolis say they are scared for their safety.

title: Coronavirus: The self-isolation choir with worldwide members
description: This weekend thousands of people will gather as an online choir to perform Handel’s Messiah.

title: In pictures: Peru's most catastrophic natural disaster
description: On 31 May 1970 an earthquake struck in Peru, triggering a landslide and leading to the deaths of 70,000.

title: Coronavirus: The mystery of asymptomatic 'silent spreaders'
description: Scientists have discovered more evidence about a strange and worrying feature of the coronavirus

title: Coronavirus: Belgian Prince Joachim tests positive after lockdown party
description: Spanish police are investigating whether a party attended by Prince Joachim breached lockdown rules.

title: Dominic Cummings: Fact-checking the row
description: Senior Conservatives are still questioning adviser's account of driving his family 260 miles during lockdown.

title: Coronavirus: Risk in UK lockdown easing too soon, warn scientists
description: Lifting restrictions is "risky", warn experts, who want a fully working test and trace system first.

title: George Floyd death: Clashes as protests spread across US
description: Crowds rally at the White House among other places over the death in police custody of George Floyd.

title: How Johnson-Thompson overcame inner doubts to strike gold in Doha
description: In a special BBC programme, Katarina Johnson-Thompson looks back at how she became world champion in Doha last year.

title: Chad Gordon shooting: Clive Spencer charged with murder
description: Chad Gordon was shot in the head at close range after answering his front door on 18 May.

title: Eastchurch cliff fall: Families evacuated as homes at risk
description: A house is "hanging" over a cliff edge and 20 are "at risk" as properties are evacuated by firefighters.

title: Microsoft 'to replace journalists with robots'
description: Dozens working on the MSN site look set to be replaced by AI, media reports say.

title: West Indies agree to England Test tour 'in principle' but take 50% pay cuts
description: Cricket West Indies agrees "in principle" to July's Test tour of England, but players and staff will take a 50% pay cut.

title: Social distancing: A practical guide to how to socialise now
description: Meeting friends? Here's how to handle the awkward new rules - from sharing food to avoiding hugs.

description: Images from protests and violence as anger over the death of black man George Floyd increases.

title: SpaceX launch: Nasa astronauts set for second try
description: SpaceX will need to beat the weather to get Nasa astronauts Doug Hurley and Bob Behnken into orbit.

title: Lionel Messi's top five World Cup goals for Argentina

description: Goalscorer supreme and possibly the greatest of all time - but how well do you know Lionel Messi?

description: Concerns over the public sticking to rules ahead of restrictions being lifted dominate Saturday's papers.

description: The events industry has new ways to keep us entertained while social distancing is still in place.

description: There is a lot of uncertainty around when and how weddings are allowed to take place. What are your rights?

title: Coronavirus: Debenhams makes some restaurant employees redundant
description: Retailer Debenhams makes staff in some of its cafes redundant after going into administration.

title: Coronavirus: School return plan 'like a jigsaw puzzle'
description: A head teacher explains how she is piecing school life back together before children return.

title: Coronavirus: Renters struggle most with pandemic costs, report says
description: Private renters are struggling with housing costs more than mortgage-payers, new research suggests.
